description:
Take a moment and think about your dream job. The job that you would quit you current job for anytime. 

Now imagine you finally got the opportunity to apply for it. You send you resume in. However, chances are that he will only look at it for 10 seconds. 

How are you going to get your resume to stand out. How will you make sure your resume is remembered. How are you going to leave an impact in just 10 seconds. 

To make things worse, how are even sure that your resume will not be filtered out before it reaches the hiring manager. 

Hi, my name is Thomas and i will be sharing with you the tips and tricks that allowed me to get many offers straight out of college. The tips that I will share here and the methods that I use are highly actionable and you will be able to revamp and give your resume a complete makeover in a couple of hours. 

You will learn how to customize your resume for different jobs so that your resume is always optimized for success.
title: Ultimate Resume Makeover Course: Get Your Dream Job
